participant_1.name: Mia
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, always striving for her dreams while nurturing important relationships.
participant_1.background: I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love. I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game. I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love. I am constantly drinking. I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Playful and introspective, with a passion for culture and a love for unique snacks.
participant_2.background: I love gummy bears and never had kids. My idol is Thierry Henry. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. I want to be a museum curator. I have freckles all over my face.

content.text: What do you think about my dream to open a restaurant?
Sounds exciting! What kind of food would you serve?
My favorite foods are Italian and Mexican. I love pasta and pizza and tacos and burritos. What about you?
I'm more of a snacker. I love gummy bears and hummus and pita bread.
Yum! I love hummus and pita too. Do you have any kids?
No, I never had any. I'm not close with my family, so I don't think I'd be a good parent.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm close with my family, but I don't want to have kids either.
I think it's great that you're so close to your family. I wish I was closer to mine.
Thanks! I'm glad I have them.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a designer. I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.
That sounds like a really cool job! I'm in school to be a museum curator.
Me too! I'm really passionate about history and art.
That's great! I'm passionate about food and design.
We should go to a museum sometime!
